title: This project aims to develop a web application called Finder 4, which helps students on campus report and recover lost items.
summary: This project aims to develop a web application called Finder 4, which helps students on campus report and recover lost items. The application will provide a lost item submission form, searchable listings, secure contact system, and a mobile-friendly interface. The team consists of three students, with roles in frontend, backend, and design, who will meet weekly to monitor progress and exchange updates.
tasks: Set up project structure and development environment
Design and implement the lost item submission form
Develop the backend API to handle user interactions
Create visually appealing and intuitive UI/UX designs
Test and ensure submission form works as intended
Create a searchable database of lost items
Set up secure contact system for users
